document_data.name: Azuth's Exalted Triad
document_data.mainbody: '''''Azuth's exalted triad''''' was a powerful [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s of the [[Church of Azuth]].
document_data.Effects: This powerful spell allowed a caster to cast the same spell several times. The spell had to be prepared and could only be a low-level spell. The desired spell was cast, followed by this one, allowing the caster to cast the prepared spell two more times.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
